work.title: C# .NET ESRI (GIS) Software Engineer
work.text: Performed maintenance and enhancements to the software that manages addresses’ geographical information on the Malaysian map. Involved C#, .NET, Oracle DB, and integration with the ESRI ArcGIS Engine. Worked independently to fix and resolve various issues and enhancements.

work.title: Assistant Manager, Map Content Developer
work.text: Team Lead for the Data Management team of a large-scale, national-level Big Data project named MyIPCS (Malaysia Integrated Population Census System). End-to-end, Big Data processing and analytics web application development, using NodeJS, React and ElasticSearch.

work.title: Assistant Manager, Junior Data Engineer (Python)
work.text: Using a Python web crawling engine called Scrapy, I was responsible for crawling and extracting data from various websites and news portals. The extracted data is then passed to my superior, who was the Data Scientist of the team.

work.title: Junior Software Developer
work.text: I was involved in solving software errors and bugs, while working closely with Microsoft Dynamics AX.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.text: I worked with Microsoft Excel and Microsoft Access, macros, and Visual Basic programming language to automate and assist data management processes.
